hooks.name: Spooky Pre-Commit Format
hooks.description: Forces code formatting so Clippy doesn't have to look at ugly indentation.

hooks.name: Commit Message Validator
hooks.description: Validates commit message format and quality.

hooks.name: Lint Staged Files
hooks.description: Lints and auto-fixes staged files before commit.

hooks.name: Roast After Lint
hooks.description: Analyzes the file on save and generates a passive-aggressive comment if errors exist.

hooks.name: Clippy Watcher
hooks.description: Notifies the Clippy Agent when new files are created.

hooks.name: Pre-Build Curse Check
hooks.description: Ensures no 'TODO' comments exist before building (Clippy hates procrastination).

hooks.name: Git Push Validator
hooks.description: Runs tests before push and blocks if they fail.

hooks.name: Post-Merge Handler
hooks.description: Checks for conflicts and updates dependencies after merge.

hooks.name: Test Runner with Roast
hooks.description: Runs tests and roasts you if they fail.

hooks.name: Dependency Audit Nag
hooks.description: Checks for outdated dependencies and judges your choices.

hooks.name: Code Complexity Shame
hooks.description: Analyzes code complexity and shames you for spaghetti code.
